title: Pulsefire Ezreal bug: PEARL doesn't say "Mystic Shot armed" when getting your Q
body: I don't know if it's just me, but it doesn't trigger when I get my Q at level one.

replies.body:
Thanks for the report! 

I just loaded into a game with him, and I'm not hearing it either.
